ModMetaData.name: Dead Cryptosleep (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: JohnnyNova
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of JohnnyNovas mod https://github.com/rimworld-frontierdevelopment/Dead-Cryptosleep
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/DeadCryptosleep][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1]Frontier Developments Dead Cryptosleep[/h1]
[h2]Features[/h2] Allows hauling corpses to cryptosleep caskets.
[h2]Languages[/h2] English
[h2]Contributions[/h2] Contributions will be credited to the authors. Merged contributions will be owned by the mod itself (important for future license changes, but we anticipate that never happening).
[h2]Localization[/h2] We want to support as many languages as possible. If you would like to submit translations please submit them as pull request.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
